description:
NOTE: You will need to be on a paid Bubble plan to use API features and this plugin.

Instructions:


‚öôÔ∏è General Setup

1Ô∏è‚É£ Enable the Data API in your App settings for your desired data type and üö® *configure appropriate privacy rules.*

2Ô∏è‚É£ Select (or don‚Äôt) using field names instead of ID in your app settings>API

3Ô∏è‚É£ In the Plugin settings: Enter your app API key for the API (Bearer {your app API key})or SSA (your app API key) actions , Add your app ID

‚ö°Create via API connector

The normal approach to using the bulk Data API - it‚Äôs fast but harder to setup and manage responses

How to use:

1Ô∏è‚É£ Set up in your front-end and back-end workflows with the ‚Äú*Create a List of things (API)*‚Äù action

‚ö°Create via SSA Action

The most ‚Äònative‚Äô feeling action to create multiple things - it‚Äôs comprehensive but will have a short warm up time when using for the first time in a while. 

1Ô∏è‚É£ Set up in your front-end and back-end workflows with the ‚Äú*Create a List of things (SSA)*‚Äù action


üóíÔ∏è Important notes:

- Objects will be created by App User - this means that privacy rules need to be configured (e.g. adding the user to the data type)
- Again, enabling the data API means you need to have the appropriate privacy rules configured

Bubble's Bulk Data API documentation can be found here:  https://manual.bubble.io/core-resources/api/the-bubble-api/the-data-api/data-api-requests#bulk-create-things
